content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Production at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) 
-  Burner Inserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) that puts iron ore into one of the furnaces
-  BeltGroup that connects the furnaces to the inserter

### Storage at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a Chest (position (52.5, -82.5)) that stores iron plates

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace fuel source
-  Ensure the furnace fuel source is not full before adding more fuel
### Errors when using furnace result
-  Ensure the furnace result is not full before producing more items
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the position is not occupied by another entity before placing
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate
-  Ensure the burner inserter has a valid source and destination

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent
-  Important variables:
  -  `transport-belt`: type `int`, value `150`
  -  `burner-inserter`: type `int`, value `9`
  -  `burner-mining-drill`: type `int`, value `1`
  -  `wood`: type `int`, value `2`
  -  `coal`: type `int`, value `1100`
  -  `stone`: type `int`, value `5`
  -  `iron-ore`: type `int`, value `1480`
  -  `iron-plate`: type `int`, value `50`
